biotools.summary: Program for discovering long shared segments of Identity by Descent (IBD) between pairs of individuals in a large population. It takes as input genotype or haplotype marker data for individuals (as well as an optional known pedigree) and generates a list of all pairwise segmental sharing.

bioschemas.name: GERMLINE
bioschemas.summary: Program for discovering long shared segments of Identity by Descent (IBD) between pairs of individuals in a large population. It takes as input genotype or haplotype marker data for individuals (as well as an optional known pedigree) and generates a list of all pairwise segmental sharing.
